Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from presumed male (same as last cut) perched about 5m above water in flooded blackwater woodland. Rather close (12m off mic). When flies, a white patch noticed in carpal area. Photo: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486051837/, link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486715376/
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Campylorhamphus trochilirostris,Pitangus sulphuratus,Monasa nigrifrons,Butorides striata,Crotophaga major,Pseudoseisura unirufa
